tests.name: AuthenticationController login should return 400 if 'user' or 'pass' is missing
AuthenticationController login should handle DB_ERROR from service
AuthenticationController login should handle INVALID_CREDENTIALS from service
AuthenticationController login should set session.userId and return json on successful login
AuthenticationController logout should destroy session and return json on successful logout
AuthenticationController signup should return 400 if 'user' or 'pass' is missing
AuthenticationController signup should handle DB_ERROR when checking existing user or creating a new one
AuthenticationController signup should set session.userId and return json on successful signup
AuthenticationController status should return isAuthenticated: true if session.userId is set
AuthenticationController status should return isAuthenticated: false if session.userId is not set
AuthenticationController csrfToken should return the csrf token in json
AuthenticationService login should throw DB_ERROR when User.findOne throws
AuthenticationService login should throw INVALID_CREDENTIALS when password does not match
AuthenticationService login should return user when credentials match
AuthenticationService signup should throw DB_ERROR when User.findOne throws
AuthenticationService signup should throw USER_ALREADY_EXISTS when user already exists
AuthenticationService signup should throw DB_ERROR when User.create fails
AuthenticationService signup should create new user on successful signup
